name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email Extractor Plus - Auto Save & Auto Tasks

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover & extract emails from any webpage. Auto save emails as you browse. Automated tasks can extract emails from multiple pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover and extract emails from any web page with ease using our powerful Email Extractor & Email Finder Chrome Extension. Designed for speed and accuracy, this extension simplifies the process of collecting emails, making it an essential tool for marketers, researchers, and anyone needing to gather email addresses from the web.

Key Features:

Fast and Accurate Email Extraction: Quickly and precisely extract emails from any web page, ensuring you get the information you need without hassle.

User-Friendly Interface: Our simple and intuitive design makes it easy for anyone to use, regardless of technical expertise.

Automatic Email Saving: As you browse the web, collected emails are automatically saved for your convenience.

Automated Tasks: Set up automatic tasks to visit dozens of websites (URLs provided by you) and let the extension run in the background, freeing you to focus on other tasks.

Resumable Tasks: If the auto task tab is accidentally closed, the extension will resume from where it stopped, ensuring no interruption in your workflow.

Unlock the full potential of your email collection process with our Email Extractor & Email Finder Chrome Extension. Download now and start extracting emails effortlessly!

If you have any questions, feature requests, or bug reports, feel free to reach out to me at revpt0189@gmail.com.
